intro: Deutzia × lemoinei var. compacta, commonly known as compact deutzia, is a compact, shrub-like plant native to China. It features small, white flowers that bloom in early spring, adding a delicate ornamental touch to gardens. The plant has finely textured, dark green foliage that provides a lush backdrop for its blooms. It is typically grown in USDA hardiness zones 5 through 8, preferring partial shade to full sun and well-drained soil. Its compact growth habit makes it ideal for small spaces, containers, or as a border plant.
